attributes.additional_details:
We the English People demand that the government introduce a citizenship law to ensure that new arrivals into the country speak fluent English.
We the English People demand that any person who arrives and is granted citizenship and then subsequently commits a serious criminal offence then we believe that those persons should be repatriated back to their place of origin
We also believe that benefits should not be available for any new comer until they have contributed 10 years of contributions.

Yours Sincerely

Oliver Healey
